name: Snip and Shear
description:
The world has collapsed and been overrun... Stay vigilant as you fight to maintain control over the waves of plants swarming you and uproot the problem at hand!

A game made by Team Banana for Global Game Jam 2023

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Camera

Left Mouse Button - Fire

---------------------------------
